page.title: 03TRADE
page.content:
There are{two}main{shops,}the{Post {Office}and the{General {Stores/Newsagents.}From the latter {3500 papers a week}are delivered. The Post Office issues{380 pensions}and {130 family allowances weekly.}The main business is run by an immigrant family of Indians, with some part-time help. The{garage}sells soft drinks, sweets, autoparts, oil, petrol, pre-packed fuels, cigarettes and tobacco. It stays open at least two hours after local shops shut. The garage runs a {breakdown service}which operates all over the county and even farther away.
The{ice-cream van}comes every day of the year. The{fish and chip van}comes on Tuesdays and Fridays and the{fresh {fish van}comes on Wednesdays. A {library van}comes on Tuesdays.
